notice.ch: 大學部六大專長領域課程

remark.ch: 大學部六大專長領域課程

goal.ch:
"振動學為機械工程研究所固力與設計組核心之一，本課程銜接動力學課程，授與學生必要的振動學知識，作為日後分析或診斷振動系統之工具。本課程主要教學目標在培養學生面對振動系統時，能有足夠之知識進行分析或設計。學生修畢此課程將能展示以下之能力：
1. 寫出離散振動系統之運動方程式。
2. 具有分析自由振動系統之能力，並能預測系統的穩定性。
3. 對受不同特性之外力激振之強迫振動系統，能夠計算出其時間響應。
4. 了解簡單的連體振動系統。"
goal.en:
"1. Wirte the equation of motion of discreted vibrating systems.
2. Perform free vibration analysis.
3. Perform forced vibration analysis.
4. Design dynamic absorbers.
5. Briefly understand the characteristics of continueous vibrating systems."

outline.ch:
"1. Fundamentals of Vibrations
2. Free Vibration of Single Degree of Freedom Systems
3. Harmonically Excited Vibration
4. Vibration Under General Forcing Conditions
5. Multidegree of Freedom Systems
6. Continuous Systems
7. Vibration Measurement and Applications (optional)"
outline.en:
"1. Fundamentals of Vibrations
2. Free Vibration of Single Degree of Freedom Systems
3. Harmonically Excited Vibration
4. Vibration Under General Forcing Conditions
5. Multidegree of Freedom Systems
6. Continuous Systems
7. Vibration Measurement and Applications (optional)"

gradMethod.ch:
25 %        HW,attendance,class performance 
10 %        quizzes
65 %        2 exams (both open + closed book)
gradMethod.en:
25 %        HW,attendance,class performance 
10 %        quizzes
65 %        2 exams (both open + closed book)

flexDiscription.ch: 如果課程內容可以提前授完，第17周將安排自主學習與補救教學，並於第18周考期末考試
flexDiscription.en: Independent study and remedial teaching will be arranged in the 17th week, and the final exam will be held in the 18th week.

en.competencies: Design / Development of Solution and Investigation

ch: 系所:限機械工程學系碩士班、機械工程學系博士班。
系所:限機械工程學系。年級:限四年級。
en: Department:MSc in Mechanical Engineering、PhD in Mechanical Engineering only.
Department:Department of Mechanical Engineering only.Year:Fourth Year only.
